label: SpeciesTTAnimal
comment: The species of a Track and Trace (TT) animal or batch of animals.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying the type of regulation species name for this TT animal.

A code specifying the type of trade species name for this TT animal.

referencedBy.comment: A species specified for this TT animal.
